this is important, so i@would reccomend reading@it.
first of all, this project@contains a "classic mode".
it uses more faithful and@well-known music and@sprites,             as well@@@@as making it more like the@original papyrus fight.
to turn it on, press c@anytime during my speech.
this project contains both@the genocide and pacifist@route.
so, once i tell you to, you@can press p for pacifist...
ready? once i finish talking,@ press z. then when my text@disappears,@@@@@press either p or g.
press c now if you want to@turn on classic mode.
press z to close this speech,@then please press p or g.
but... i thought@there was a chance.
whatever the case,@i still believe in@you!
you can do a little@better, even if you@don't think you@can!
you're weak, human!         @i was easily able@to capture you!
now i will put you@in the capture area!
at least i still@have my head.
so, you have@finally revealed@your deepest@feelings for me!
does this mean i@have to go on a@date with you@now..?
w-we shall date@later!!      @after i capture you!
not bad human, but@don't expect me to@stop fighting!
then let's see how@you hold up to my@famous 0123@455467!
i probably should've@guessed, conidering@how you've acted@thus far.
well, let's see how@you hold up to my@famous 0123@455467!
are you sad, 'cause@you look a little@0123?
you thought this@was gonna be easy,@didn't you?
that's because you@haven't dealt with@the full force of the@magnificent sans!
mweh heh heh heh@heh heh heh heh@heh heh heh heh!
what!? no!       @i'm not thinking@about that date@thing at all!
press up longer to@jump higher, jeez!
don't force me to@use my special@attack!
the queen will trim@a hedge in the@shape of my@smile!!!
actually, i don't@think he will@change at all.
will anyone like me@as sincerely as@you?
give up or face@my special attack!
yeah, it won't be@long before i use@it!
come back here with@my special attack!!
i'll just use a@really cool regular@attack!
therefore i, the@magnificent sans,@have decided to@spare you, human!
now is your chance@to accept my@mercy.

input0: * hey, hate to bother@  ya, but could you do@  me a favour?
* i've been thinking...         @* my bro's been kinda@  blue lately.
* he's never seen a@  human before.
* and seeing you might@  just make his day.
* even if he tries to@  be.
* thanks a quintillion.@* i'll be up ahead.
* allow me to tell you about@  some complex feelings.
* the joy of finding another@  pun-lover.
* the admiration for@  another's puzzle-solving@  skills.
* the desire to have a@  cool, smart person think@  you are cool.
* they must be what you are@  feeling right now!
* i can hardly imagine what@  it must feel like!
* after all, i am very@  magnificent.
* i never wonder what it@  is like to have lots@  of friends.
* i, the magificent sans,@  will be your...
* i can't be your friend!         @* you are a human!        @* i must capture you!
* then, i can achive my@  lifelong dream!
* how did you escape from@  my capture area?
* i still have to capture@  you!
* i told you earlier i would@  make you food.
* it's only natural that@  you would want to see me...
* in the dire hope that i@  would make you some.
* let's just get to the point.
* hey, i'm talking to you,@  so quit moving!
* i, the magnificent sans,@  have a few words to say.
* first of all: you are a@  really weird person!
* you don't like jokes,@  you don't like puzzles...
* and you and shamble@  around from place to@  place...
* your hands are always@  covered in dusty powder...
* like your life is going down@  a dangerous path.
* i, the magnificent sans,@  see great potential within@  you!
* everyone can be a good@  person, if they just try!
* and i believe you can, too.
* mweh heh heh heh@  heh heh heh heh!!
* this is exactly what i@  am taking about!
* human, i think you are@  in need of guidance!
* someone needs to keep@  you on the straight and@  narrow!
* but worry not!      @* for i, sans...
* will gladly be your@  friend and mentor!
* will turn your life right@  around!
* are you offering a hug@ of acceptance?
* huh!     @* i guess my lessons are@  already working!
* i, sans, welcome you with@  open arms!
